files.content:
Okay, here's your email summary, ready to be read aloud:

Hey! So, checking in on your inbox this afternoon, it looks like it was a pretty standard day. You received a handful of emails, mostly notifications and some job alerts. There was a LinkedIn alert about a Business Management Analyst position at Toyota â€“ sounds interesting! And you also got an Indeed alert for marketing intern positions, with BMW mentioned. You also have a LinkedIn connection request waiting.

Besides those, you got your usual daily summaries from Chase and American Express, and some promotional stuff from Medium and American Express. Oh, and there was a general announcement from the Social Security Administration. No urgent stuff today, so you're all clear on the action items front! Enjoy the rest of your day!

files.name: 20250814_storytelling_summary.txt
files.content:
Hey there! So, your inbox had a pretty busy day today. You received a total of 16 emails, covering all sorts of things. There were the usual financial updates from Robinhood, American Express, and Chase â€“ you know, the ones keeping an eye on your money. You also got a notification about your Guidehouse application, some LinkedIn job recommendations, and even a tutoring opportunity on Superprof.

And then there was a whole bunch of marketing stuff! You got emails from Extern, Saigon Classical, Medium, Amtrak, and Tech Stock Insider. Sounds like you might want to take a quick peek and see if there are any lists you want to unsubscribe from. The good news is, there are no urgent action items for you today, so you're all clear!
